overview: The sweetheart of Motown roars back on stage in this fantastic concert! Recorded in front of a energetic audience, the show contains performances of the Reeves classics Dancing In The Street, Nowhere To Run, (Love Is Like A) Heat Wave and lots more! Reeves has been shining in the spotlight recently with appearances on Jimmy Kimmel Live!, performing with The Crystal Method, as well as a recent performance on the hit TV show Dancing With The Stars.
tagline: The sweetheart of Motown roars back on stage in this fantastic concert recorded in front of a energetic audience. Includes performances of the Reeves classics Dancing In The Street, Nowhere To Run, and lots more!
title: Martha Reeves: Live in Concert
